mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Jane C.B. Washington to John Augustine Washington III, 1838 January
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Washington, Jane Charlotte Blackburn, 1786-1855
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gives family news and an account of a visit by a gentleman who spent the night at Mount Vernon and gave $5 to West Ford. Discusses sale of a slave to his cousin. Has heard of a bill by the federal government to purchase Mount Vernon and wishes it would be accepted. Mentions prices and terms. Autograph letter signed, 3 pages, with integral address panel.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: p Ford, West, approximately 1784-1863
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: John Augustine Washington III and Mount Vernon Ladies' Association (MVLA) collection
